snippet: A politically motivated amnesty bill threatens the government’s future.
abstract: Editorial criticizes government of Thai Prime Min Yingluck Shinawatra for pushing an ill-conceived amnesty bill to pardon anyone facing almost any charge arising from period of political crisis from 2004 to 2010; holds bill, which will put country's fragile democracy in peril, is politically motivated, as it would allow former Prime Min Thaksin Shinawatra to return to the country.
lead_paragraph: A politically motivated amnesty bill threatens the government’s future.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
